entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Blind River

entry.title: Tuesday: Cloudy. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 3 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning and afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
